titleStmt.title: The orange gazette. With allowance. From Friday February 22. to Tuesday February 26. 1688/9.
Orange gazette (London, England : 1688). no. 15.
titleStmt.author: Curtis, Jane, fl. 1680.

notesStmt.note: "J.C." is probably Jane Curtis, wife of Langly Curtis, booksellers at various addresses "near Fleet-Bridge" who were frequently in trouble with the authorities. Cf. H.R. Plomer.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
